dataModel.title: Prototype Veg Plots Database Component Description: definedValue
dataModel.author: J. Harris
dataModel.description: This table stores the names and values of user defined attributes.

entity.entitySummary: This table stores the user defined information.
entity.entityDescription: This table stores information representing user defined attributes. Through the 'userDefined' table these attributes are associated with a plot observation and catagorized into as specific types, such as environmental or vegetation.

attribute.attDefinition: Primary key in the definedValue table.
Foreign key into the userDefined table.
The value of the user defined value.
The numeric value of the primary key that this user defined value is associated with as specified in the userDefined.tableName attribute.
The actual data associated with the user defined attribute.
